name: Tabs at Top, Chromifox Tweaks 3 by Hasan Yılmaz
description:
Tabs at the top like googles chrome for chromifox ff3 theme...combined stop n reload buttons, bigger fonts, statusbar tweaks, fission tweaks, tmp tweaks and many many more.... 
but first u need to install some extensions like personal menu, urlbar ext, Locationbar², fission, tab mix plus...

this is my 3rd style...
recent ones; 
http://userstyles.org/styles/14047
http://userstyles.org/styles/14953

i cannot write codes by myself! i just copy n paste them, and of course change some numeric values! but although, it takes really so much time! lol! so i think i have to thank people who prepares and writes those wonderful codes!as u know we need those people!
